h2_title: Where to Find the Snow Fox
content: Go up the sloped wooden bridge, and straight up the stairs to the left. This will bring you to the temple where the monk is. However, **this is also when you'll need to be in fox form**. Doing so will activate a cutscene and trigger a boss fight against the Yaoguai Chief Non-Void. Transform into the fox by using the Snow Fox Brush from your inventory, then step inside the temple.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Snow_Fox_Questline.md', within the main section titled 'Snow Fox Questline', specifically from the subsection 'Where to Find the Snow Fox' and the sub-subsection 'Returning to Fox Form'.
The content is as follows:
Go up the sloped wooden bridge, and straight up the stairs to the left. This will bring you to the temple where the monk is. However, **this is also when you'll need to be in fox form**. Doing so will activate a cutscene and trigger a boss fight against the Yaoguai Chief Non-Void. Transform into the fox by using the Snow Fox Brush from your inventory, then step inside the temple.
